txt.en: 'Did you encounter any danger upon the stair? I ask because I was nearly killed by a spear flung at me from above. I suspect goblins are the culprit, but they were too cowardly to show themselves.\n\n'If you climb up again, I have no doubt that you will find scheming, mischievous goblins waiting with pointy sticks at the ready. I, for one, will not miss them if you wish to cleave a few of their skulls.'
'Well done! Now I need not fear that my toes get impaled by hurling spears when I begin my ascent!'
Svanr was nearly killed by a spear flung at him as he climbed down Khadar-zarâm, the great stair of Nud-melek. That can only mean one thing: goblins up above!
Enemies can be found on the highest levels of Khadar-zarâm in Nud-melek.\n\nYou should defeat enemies that wait upon the stair to waylay innocent travellers.
Svanr can be found at the foot of the great stair in western Nud-melek.\n\nYou should return to Svanr and tell him that you have cleared out many enemies within Khadar-zarâm.
